short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension that allows you to compare prices of books across multiple websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pages on pages allows you to find the cheapest place to buy a book, no matter where you search for it. You can search for a book on Amazon, Google, Thriftbooks, or many other sites, and a small popup will appear that tells you the cheapest price, when clicked the popup will expand and give a detailed and ordered list of the cheapest place to buy a book.
